divs: Sighting Detailsaround july-4 last year i seen a little biright light come down from the sky and it look at the fireworks for about 10 sec, then shot back in the sky a diffent way then it came from..all it was is a white light! when it took off it moved very fast, it look to me it was seeing what the fireworks where! i can,t tell you how big it was,but it seem to be not that big, maybe the size of a small car,it look just like a birght star,the size and all,but no star moves like that!!!!
